title: Why Switch to Dyson? - Official Dyson Video
description:
Saving time on household chores is important and with Dyson it 
makes cleaning that much easier and that much faster.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
Saving time on household chores is important and with Dyson it 
makes cleaning that much easier and that much faster. 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: In the past vacuums that we owned were constantly breaking down, sucking up my carpet, and actually damaging my furniture. With traditional vacuums and the old vacuum that I had, it had a bag so you couldn't really tell whenever it was full until it started puffing dust out. You bring in a lot of dirt just walking in and out on a daily basis and I just don't think that my old vacuums got any of that, my Dyson vacuum does. Saving time on household chores like cleaning is extremely important and the Dyson vacuum really makes cleaning that much easier and that much faster. When I got my Dyson vacuum I threw all of my old vacuum sweepers out.
